We estimated the transmission rate within Wuhan, ğ›½ğ›½, to be 1.07 d-1 (95%CI, 1.06â€“1.09), while we found the infectious period to be 3.6 days (95%CI, 3.6â€“3.6). We calculated the basic reproduction number, ğ‘…ğ‘…0, of the infection to be 3.8 (95%CI, 3.6â€“4.0)

We assumed that the incubation period was 4 days, based on an estimate for SARS, a related coronavirus (Lessler et al. 2009).
